Israeli Salad

Description

Healthy and refreshing

Ingredients

  • 1 english cucumber
  • 1 large carrot
  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes
  • 1 jalapeno
  • 1 red or green bell pepper
  • 1 shallot or small onion (optional)
  • 1 cup kalamata olives
  • 1/2 cup fresh minced parsley (optional)
  • 1 lemon
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

Steps

  1. Dice the cucumber, carrot, tomatoes, jalapeno, pepper, and shallot.
  2. Cut olives into halves or quarters.
  3. Toss together with juice of lemon, parsley, and olive oil.
  4. The acids from the lemon and tomato will marinate the other ingredients with time, so best when prepared a day or two before eating.

About

A lot of our family recipes were being kept on somewhat decaying index cards in a metal box under the stove. Inconvenient and impermanent, we decided to preserve them in a way that also offers greater ease of use! Welcome to the Harel Family Recipe Box. Food is good! Let's eat :)
